entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
